channel.title: SlewScape 743 - Off-hand weapons! upgradable weapons! all 25 skills! Duel arena!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qimmb9.png[/img][/center]
[b]Forums[/b] = [url=http://www.slewscape.com]www.slewscape.com[/url] [b]Download Client:[/b] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/51734385/SlewScape.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/51734385/SlewScape.jar[/url] Features: autovote highscores autodonate upgrade weapons off hand weapons!
Eco based. Perfect PvM/PvP/Prayers. Perfect switching. All skills are working! Regular Donator and Extreme donator zone! Fully working barbarian agility course + advanced! Fully working Gnome agility course + advanced! Godwars dungeon reworked! (you now require killcounts for bosses!)
A huge list of Player versus Monster teleports. Many working aura's, like Supreme corruption, Salvation and Harmony. All for sale! Squeal of fortune. Xp Counter. Money Pouch. No items lost on death, unless you die in the wilderness, or in any unsafe PvP zone or at Corp! Nex sets with HP bonusses. Awesome xp in skilling, and combat. Including automated double EXP weekends. Easy teleporting/traveling. Handy noticeboard, which allows you to change your display name, and character look. Custom shop names, so it will be easy to find what you need. Loyality system: this gives you 250 points for playing each 30 minutes, these points can be used to buy aura's at the loyality shop. Nice starters!
Media:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zg7l7p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2n25g7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rwqjjl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2v9c4s9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/mrv6gn.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2url3lk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/vzhu14.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2en2u15.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@khayam wrote:

[center][/center]

Forums = www.slewscape.com
Download Client: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/51734385/SlewScape.jar
Features:
autovote
highscores
autodonate
upgrade weapons
off hand weapons!

Eco based.
Perfect PvM/PvP/Prayers.
Perfect switching.
All skills are working!
Regular Donator and Extreme donator zone!
Fully working barbarian agility course + advanced!
Fully working Gnome agility course + advanced!
Godwars dungeon reworked! (you now require killcounts for bosses!)

A huge list of Player versus Monster teleports.
Many working aura’s, like Supreme corruption, Salvation and Harmony. All for sale!
Squeal of fortune.
Xp Counter.
Money Pouch.
No items lost on death, unless you die in the wilderness, or in any unsafe PvP zone or at Corp!
Nex sets with HP bonusses.
Awesome xp in skilling, and combat. Including automated double EXP weekends.
Easy teleporting/traveling.
Handy noticeboard, which allows you to change your display name, and character look.
Custom shop names, so it will be easy to find what you need.
Loyality system: this gives you 250 points for playing each 30 minutes, these points can be used to buy aura’s at the loyality shop.
Nice starters!
